page.title: 13SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: Beyond the normal clubs, three main sports venues are to be found in the village. 1.THE J.PENROSE CENTRE - It is used by the J.Penrose school in the day and by the public in the evenings and at weekends.There is an indoor sports hall together with a gymnasium: it teends to be used by people within a 5 mile radius of the village. 2.THE CRICKET CLUB - normally fields three teams and plays in the Truman 75 League.It is to be found at Breakspear Rd. North. 3.THE FOOTBALL CLUB - won the Athenian League Cup in 1984 and now plays in the Isthmian League.The club posseses both grass and an all weather training surface.The ground is at Preston Park.
